title: Blended Learning Course Based on High-Level Classroom Study (HELS) for Developing Scientific Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducted in a hybrid setting combining a smartphone-based mobile learning platform with bi-monthly offline workshops. Emphasis on enhancing science job competencies linked to employment

learning_goals: Over 80% improvement in integrated connection ability among core science concepts.
Achievement of level 3 scientific thinking skills through experimental design-analysis-problem-solving processes.
Over 70% fulfillment of evaluation criteria (understanding-application-innovation) when performing SCF (Subject Competency Framework)-based tasks.
Science concept explanation skills via peer teaching executed at least twice monthly per learner.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
